meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that oxysalts have oxygen in them.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed oxysalts to help with my stomach acidity.
meanings.sent3: The oxygen-rich oxysalts danced around in the test tube, showing off their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like the oxygen in oxysalts, essential and life-giving.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the oxysalts made them stand out in the lab experiment.

meanings.definition: Salts formed by the reaction of an acid with a base.
meanings.sent1: Mixing the acid and base resulted in the formation of oxysalts.
meanings.sent2: The oxysalts created a neutral solution when added to the mixture.
meanings.sent3: The oxysalts played the role of peacemaker between the acid and base, bringing harmony.
meanings.sent4: The oxysalts were like the bridge connecting the acid and base in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The student observed the formation of oxysalts with fascination during the experiment.
